SpectralAngleClassification
Classifies an image using a spectral measure.
Hyperspectral
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|in|Input Image Filename|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|ie|Input endmembers|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|measure|Output spectral angle values|None|True
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|out|Output classified image|None|True
OTBParameterChoice|mode|Measure used for classification|sam;sid|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|threshold|Classification threshold|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|bv|Background value|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|0|True
